segments.text: My eyes keep drifting to the boy on that wobbly stool.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so intent on reaching those cookies in the jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The stool looks incredibly unstable, its legs splayed out.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I can almost see it tipping backward at any moment.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's stretched so far, one hand already in the cookie jar.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The other hand holds a plate, ready to catch his sugary prize.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: It's a bold move, climbing up there like that.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: Doesn't he realize how dangerous this is?
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He could fall and seriously hurt himself, along with the cookies.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: This whole situation is making me quite nervous.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: I wish someone would just secure that stool or help him down.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: The thought of him crashing down is truly unsettling.
segments.speaker: PAR

segments.text: He's so focused on his sweet reward, completely ignoring the risk.
segments.speaker: PAR
